item.title: aws-kms-crypt
item.description: aws-kms-crypt is a cross-language utility for securing the confidentiality of secrets and sensitive data in AWS. The key features of this tool are: Simple APIs for encrypting and decrypting sensitive data Interoperable implementations for multiple languages (Bash, Node and Python) Envelope Encryption with AES-128-CBC and KMS generated data keys. That is, all secret data is encrypted locally and never sent to Amazon in plain text. Installation Node.
